title: The Journey of Baby Angel
description: The Journey of Baby Angel is a sentimental story meant for children and adults alike. Go along with Baby Angel as she travels her path and sees who she meets along the way. This touching story will remind you of the loving family memories you want to share with your baby angel. If your family has expereinced the loss of a family member, use this story to help your little ones visualize what heaven may look like for those family members.
author: Traci Waters
